text: hello yesterday I was trying to debug a script, during the execution Jmeter was unresponsive and was hanging up this happed twice I used task manager and ended the Jmeter task , but for some reason script was still running in the back ground .Jmeter is not integrated with any CI TOOLS its standalone. Even when my machine was power off script was still running . what could be the reason for this issue.

Bugzilla is not a support forum.
Please ask on user mailing list of JMeter.
Thanks
